i-photosynthesis: Inqubo izitshalo ezisebenzisa ngayo ukukhanya kwelanga, amanzi, ne-CO2 ukukhiqiza ukudla (iglucose)
ukuphefumula kwamaselula: Inqubo lapho amaseli ephula khona i-glucose ukuze akhulule amandla
i-chlorophyll: I-pigment eluhlaza ezitshalweni emunca ukukhanya kwelanga ku-photosynthesis
dna: I-Deoxyribonucleic acid, i-molecule ephethe ulwazi lofuzo
rna: I-Ribonucleic acid, i-molecule ehilelekile ku-protein synthesis
amaprotheni: I-molecule eyenziwe ngama-amino acid, enza imisebenzi ehlukahlukene yomzimba
iseli: Iyunithi eyisisekelo yokuphila, isisekelo sokwakha zonke izinto eziphilayo
izicubu: Iqembu lamaseli afanayo asebenza ndawonye ukuze enze umsebenzi othile
isitho: Iqembu lamathishu asebenza ndawonye ukuze enze umsebenzi othile
uhlelo lwesitho: Iqembu lezitho ezisebenza ndawonye ukwenza umsebenzi oyinkimbinkimbi
i-homeostasis: Ikhono lezinto eziphilayo ukugcina indawo yangaphakathi ezinzile
ukuzivumelanisa nezimo: Ushintsho entweni ephilayo eyisiza ukuba iphile futhi izalane endaweni yayo
ukuziphendukela kwemvelo: Inqubo lapho inani labantu bezinto eziphilayo lishintsha khona ngokuhamba kwesikhathi
ukukhetha kwemvelo: Inqubo lapho izinto eziphilayo ezinezici ezifanele kangcono imvelo yazo kungenzeka ziphile futhi zizalane
imvelo: Ucwaningo lokuthi izinto eziphilayo zixhumana kanjani nezinye kanye nendawo yazo
i-ecosystem: Umphakathi wezinto eziphilayo nendawo yazo engaphili uxhumana nomunye nomunye
i-taxonomy: Igatsha le-biology eliphathelene nokuhlukanisa izinto eziphilayo
i-morphology: Igatsha le-biology eliphathelene nocwaningo lwefomu nesakhiwo
i-physiology: Igatsha le-biology eliphathelene nocwaningo lomsebenzi nezinqubo zezinto eziphilayo
i-autotroph: Inyama ekwazi ukukhiqiza ukudla kwayo isebenzisa ukukhanya noma amakhemikhali (isb., izitshalo)
i-heterotroph: Umzimba othola ukudla ngokudla ezinye izinto eziphilayo (isb., izilwane)
umthengi: Inyama edla izinto eziphilayo ezikhiqizwa ezinye izinto eziphilayo (isb., izilwane)
isiboli: Umzimba odiliza izinto ezifile nezinto eziphilayo (isb., isikhunta, amagciwane)
inani labantu: Iqembu lezinto eziphilayo zohlobo olufanayo ezihlala endaweni ethile
umphakathi: Iqembu labantu abahlukene elixhumana endaweni ethile
i-biome: I-ecosystem enkulu enezimila nezilwane (isb., ugwadule, ihlathi lemvula)
izinhlobonhlobo zezinto eziphilayo: Izinhlobonhlobo zezinto eziphilayo eMhlabeni kuwo wonke amazinga, kusuka ezakhini zofuzo kuye kuma-ecosystem
